CustomField.description: 30991 Crews, like "floaters," who will not ever be assigned a Phase or WBS for any projects can be assigned to a Service Appointment/Work Order so that they can start and even complete work before the Work Order Primary Resource (Phase) has been assigned.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Field is required for Type Crew in order for Dispatching flow to properly identify if the crew requires a Phase to be assigned to SA
CustomField.label: Phase Required
